Token.Abstract: Various utility methods in support of cryptographic operations.
Creates a random string of bytes (based on arc4random() generation) and returns them as an NSData object.

Parameter.Name: lengthInBytes
Parameter.Abstract: The number of bytes to generate.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The string of random bytes, as an NSData object.

Token.Abstract: Creates a PBKDF2 derived key from an input key (string), using default values for the random-generated salt data and its length, the number of derivation rounds, and the derived key length.

Parameter.Name: stringToHash
Parameter.Abstract: The plaintext string used to generate the key.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SFPBKDFData object representing the derived key.

Token.Abstract: Creates a PBKDF2 derived key from an input key (string), a salt, number of derivation rounds, and desired derived key length.

Parameter.Name: stringToHash
Parameter.Abstract: The base string to use for the derived key.

Parameter.Name: salt
Parameter.Abstract: The salt to append to the string.

Parameter.Name: numDerivationRounds
Parameter.Abstract: The number of derivation rounds used to generate the key.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An SFPBKDFData object representing the derived key.

Token.Abstract: Encrypt the given data using the AES-256 algorithm.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The encryption key used to encrypt the data.

Parameter.Name: iv
Parameter.Abstract: The initialization vector data used for the encryption.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The encrypted data, or nil if encryption was not successful.

Token.Abstract: Decrypt the given data using the AES-256 algorithm.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: The decryption key used to decrypt the data.

Parameter.Name: iv
Parameter.Abstract: The initialization vector data used for the decryption.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The decrypted data, or nil if decryption was not successful.
